definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: letter, letter-missive (late, prob. loan-word, As. egirtu Dl:W)—abs. Ne 2:8 + 2 t.; cstr. Es 9:29; pl. [[אִגְּרוֹת]] abs. 2Ch 30:1 + 3 t.; cstr. Ne 2:9; [[אִגְּרׂתֵיהֶם]] Ne 6:17—letter, esp. royal letter 2Ch 30:1, 2Ch 30:6, Ne 2:7, Ne 2:8, Ne 2:9; but also others Ne 6:5, Ne 6:17, Ne 6:19, Es 9:26, Es 9:29 (‖[[סֵפֶר]] vv:Es 9:20; vv:Es 9:30; other syn. [[מִכְתָּב]], [[נִשְׁתְּוׇן]] q.v.)
